VISUAL ELEMENTS.Background environment: Medical/biological setting, red and organic—suggests microscopic view of fertilization process.

Font characteristics.emphasis: Strong; with all capitalized words except 'To Improve'
Font characteristics.color: Black text on bright yellow background for main message; white small text for channel name

Text placement within frame.main_message: Centrally placed on the ovum in a yellow highlight box

THEMATIC ELEMENTS.Visual metaphors or symbols: Fertilization process—egg and sperm cells—represents fertility and reproductive health
Clickbait techniques employed: Medical imagery grabs attention for those interested in fertility
Brand elements present: Pregnancy & Postpartum TV logo and name

THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Visual reinforcement: The thumbnail directly references fertility and egg quality with the microscopic view of sperm surrounding an egg, visually strengthening the connection to the video’s focus on foods for improving fertility (as per the title).
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts or mismatches: No significant mismatch; the thumbnail aligns well with the title, both emphasizing fertility, egg quality, and actionable tips ('How Many Of These Are you Eating? #fertility').
